title: Low Fps if there is more players
body:
Hello,if i am alone in game i have hight Fps 120 when is Team fight my Fps drop down on 10 Fps .
i have ADM 9550 Quad -core 2,20Ghz
4gb Ram
ATI radeon 4890 1Gb
430 W power
w7 64bit

replies.body: There could be a bad game file or outdated driver causing some rendering issues during some bigger fights.  Go through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up and get your frame rate back up.  Let me know if you run into any issues, though.

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
